Auto s pasažierom začalo horieť, okoloidúci si nehodu len natáčali a nepomohli. Kým prišli hasiči, zo šoféra bola len kostra
04 Nov 2019, 12:54 by Alexandra Murajdová

Ak by mu hneď pomohli, tak mohol byť nažive.

53-ročný podnikateľ Premchand Jain z Indie bol na ceste do svojej továrne, keď jeho auto zachvátili plamene a nevedel sa dostať von, pretože sa nedalo odomknúť. Okoloidúci si celý incident natáčali namiesto toho, aby sa mu niekto z nich pokúsil pomôcť, informuje Indian Express.



pixabay


Miestny hasič hovorí, že hneď, ako dostali o nehode správu, na miesto vyslali dve hasičské autá. Kým sa im však podarilo plamene uhasiť, z muža ostala už len kostra. Dodáva, že ľudia si aj vtedy všetko natáčali. Ak by však k autu pribehli hneď, ako oheň začal a rozbili okno, tak by prežil.
Svedkovia hovoria, že sa mu na diaľnici vypol motor, no podarilo sa mu ho opäť naštartovať. Prešiel pár stoviek metrov a vnútro auta sa už začalo napĺňať dymom. Počiatočné vyšetrovanie naznačuje, že nehodu spôsobil skrat v aute, no celý incident sa bude naďalej vyšetrovať.
Podobný prípad sa stal len pred pár mesiacmi, kedy si kamaráti nahrávali bitku, pri ktorej jeden z chlapcov zomrel. Je pre ľudí skutočne dôležitejšie mať veci zaznamenané a neskôr sa s nimi pochváliť, ako zachrániť život?




ĎALŠIE ČLÁNKY, KTORÉ BY ŤA MOHLI ZAUJÍMAŤ

The car with the passenger started to burn, passers-by just filming the accident and did not help. By the time firefighters arrived, the driver was just a skeleton
04 Nov 2019, 12:54 by Alexandra Murajdova

If they helped him right away, he could be alive.

53-year-old businessman Premchand Jain from India was on his way to his factory when his car was engulfed in flames and could not get out because it could not be unlocked. Passers-by were filming the incident instead of trying to help him, reports Indian Express.



pixabay


The local firefighter says that as soon as they got the news about the accident, two fire trucks were sent to the scene. By the time they managed to extinguish the flames, only the skeleton remained of the man. He adds that people were shooting everything back then. But if they came to the car as soon as the fire started and broke the window, he would survive.
Witnesses say his engine was shut off on the highway, but he was able to restart it. He walked a few hundred meters and the inside of the car was already filling with smoke. Initial investigation suggests that the accident was caused by a short circuit in the car, but the entire incident will continue to be investigated.
A similar case happened only a few months ago when friends recorded a battle in which one of the boys died. Is it really more important for people to have things recorded and later to show off how to save their lives?
